definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Now being created in the image of God carries a further implication.
sentences.chinese: 那么依上帝形象创造便有了更多的涵意。

sentences.english: Don't just pay attention to words. Note the speaker's tone of voice and body language to get the full meaning.
sentences.chinese: 而要留心讲者的声调和肢体语言以听取完整的涵意。

sentences.english: The words "snake" and "red" have unpleasant connotations for many people.
sentences.chinese: 许多人认为“蛇”和“红色”有着不好的涵意。

sentences.english: The possible strategy implications are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 相关之策略涵意亦于文中加以说明之。

sentences.english: What was the import of his speech?
sentences.chinese: 他那篇演说的涵意是什么？

sentences.english: The color green represents many different things.
sentences.chinese: 绿色象征很多不同的涵意。

sentences.english: Note the speaker's tone of voice and body language to get the full meaning.
sentences.chinese: 而要留心讲者的声调和肢体语言以听取完整的涵意。

definition: meaning (implicit in a phrase)/implied meaning/hidden meaning/hint/connotation
the implied message is deep (idiom); having deep implications
to have profound import (idiom); to be deeply significant
to contain/to hold/content/(of a poem etc) full of implicit meaning
